name: Kugelblitz
overview: An addictive action arcade game created for the 2020 C64 4KB Game Coding Competition by Ali Pouladi & Marukpa and with music by Richard Bayliss. How long can you hang on before falling to your death?! Use joystick in port 2 to play. You can choose the difficulty level at the beginning. Press and hold the SPACE key at any time during the game to go back to the difficulty screen.
